verbose_text: In the present study, to examine the effects of EZH2 on OSCC cells, cell proliferation, apoptosis, invasion and migration were examined in the CAL-27 and SCC-4 cells following transfection with si-NC or si-EZH2 for 48 h. Western blot analysis revealed that EZH2 expression was significantly decreased in the CAL-27 and SCC-4 cells transfected with si-EZH2 for 48 h compared with the si-Scramble group (XREF_FIG).
